findings.title: python.flask.security.audit.debug-enabled.debug-enabled
findings.description: Detected Flask app with debug=True. Do not deploy to production with this flag enabled as it will leak sensitive information. Instead, consider using Flask configuration variables or setting 'debug' using system environment variables.
findings.code_snippet:
app.run(
        host='127.0.0.1',  # Localhost only for security
        port=5000,
        debug=True,
        threaded=True
    )

findings.title: python.lang.security.audit.hardcoded-password-default-argument.hardcoded-password-default-argument
findings.description: Hardcoded password is used as a default argument to '__init__'. This could be dangerous if a real password is not supplied.
findings.suppression_justification: (ASH) Suppressing finding for rule 'python.lang.security.audit.hardcoded-password-default-argument.hardcoded-password-default-argument' in 'scripts/generate_demo_database.py' with reason: This is a demo database setup script
findings.code_snippet:
def __init__(self, db_path: str = "networth_demo.db", password: str = "demo123"):
        """
        Initialize demo database creator.

        Args:
            db_path: Path for the demo database file
            password: Password for encryption (default demo password)
        """
        self.db_path = db_path
        self.password = password
        self.encryption_service = EncryptionService()

        # Derive encryption key with fixed salt for demo consistency
        demo_salt = b'demo_salt_123456'  # Fixed salt for demo database
        self.encryption_service.derive_key(password, demo_salt)

findings.title: typescript.react.security.audit.react-unsanitized-method.react-unsanitized-method
findings.description: Detection of insertAdjacentHTML from non-constant definition. This can inadvertently expose users to cross-site scripting (XSS) attacks if this comes from user-provided input. If you have to use insertAdjacentHTML, consider using a sanitization library such as DOMPurify to sanitize your HTML.

findings.title: html.security.audit.missing-integrity.missing-integrity
findings.description: This tag is missing an 'integrity' subresource integrity attribute. The 'integrity' attribute allows for the browser to verify that externally hosted files (for example from a CDN) are delivered without unexpected manipulation. Without this attribute, if an attacker can modify the externally hosted resource, this could lead to XSS and other types of attacks. To prevent this, include the base64-encoded cryptographic hash of the resource (file) you’re telling the browser to fetch in the 'integrity' attribute for all externally hosted files.
findings.suppression_justification: (ASH) Suppressing finding for rule 'html.security.audit.missing-integrity.missing-integrity' in 'templates/base.html' with reason: Base HTML template.The integrity checks not applicable

Without this attribute, if an attacker can modify the externally hosted resource, this could lead to XSS and other types of attacks. findings.title: python.django.security.django-no-csrf-token.django-no-csrf-token
findings.description: Manually-created forms in django templates should specify a csrf_token to prevent CSRF attacks.
findings.suppression_justification: (ASH) Suppressing finding for rule 'python.django.security.django-no-csrf-token.django-no-csrf-token' in 'templates/base.html' with reason: This will run locally on a user machine

findings.title: html.security.audit.missing-integrity.missing-integrity
findings.description: This tag is missing an 'integrity' subresource integrity attribute. The 'integrity' attribute allows for the browser to verify that externally hosted files (for example from a CDN) are delivered without unexpected manipulation. Without this attribute, if an attacker can modify the externally hosted resource, this could lead to XSS and other types of attacks. To prevent this, include the base64-encoded cryptographic hash of the resource (file) you’re telling the browser to fetch in the 'integrity' attribute for all externally hosted files.
findings.suppression_justification: (ASH) Suppressing finding for rule 'html.security.audit.missing-integrity.missing-integrity' in 'templates/base.html' with reason: Base HTML template.The integrity checks not applicable
